sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { Image, ListGroup, Row, Col, Card, Button, ListGroupItem, Container, } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { detailsOfProject } from '../actions/projectAction' import ErrorMessageBox from '../components/ErrorMessagebox' import Loading from '../components/Loading' export default function StartProjectScreen() { //const navigate = useNavigate() const params = useParams() const dispatch = useDispatch() const projectDetails = useSelector((state) => state.projectDetails) const { project, loading, error } = projectDetails useEffect(() => { dispatch(detailsOfProject(params.slug)) }) return ( <> Back to result {loading ? ( ) : error ? ( {error} ) : (

{project.name}
Location: {project.Location}
By: {project.by}

Description: {project.description}

Challenge: {project.Challenge}

Solution: {project.Solution}

Longterm Impact: {project.LongTermImpact}

Category: {project.category}
Status:{' '} {project.donationGoal <= project.currentdonation ? 'Donation goal has been completed' : 'In progress'}
Donation needed: ${project.donationGoal}
Collected amount: ${project.currentdonation}
 )} ) }
